titleStmt.title: Pasquils passe, and passeth not Set downe in three pees. His passe, precession, and prognostication.
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by V[alentine] S[immes] for Iohn Smithicke, and are to be solde at his shop within Temple Barre,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: N.B., i.e. Nicholas Breton.
The words "passe .. prognostication" are bracketed together on the title page.
Vertical chain lines. In some copies quire F has horizontal chain lines.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
